name: The dali thundering concept
description:
Help Barry The Straw avoid the obstacles to make sure he reaches the plastic continent. Music video game for The Dali Thundering Concept's single As The Sirens Call out of the album All Mighty Men. Follow us on social media and share your highest scores.
www.facebook.com/thedalithunderingconcept www.instagram.com/thedalithunderingconcept www.tiktok.com/@thedalithunderingconcept www.patreon.com/thedalithunderingconcept

Want to know more about the project? The Dali Thundering Concept is a french progressive metal band that creates concept albums to raise awarness and get people to start talking about various topics such as global warming, social injustice and humans place in the world.

The band is currently releasing their thrid album All Mighty Men which tell the tale of Barry The Straw an anthropomorphic plastic straw. From it's birth in a Factory to his arrival on the plastic continent embark on an epic adventure between lords of the rings and sausage party.

Video game created by Killian et l'autre:https://www.instagram.com/kilianetlautre/
Music and Concept by The Dali Thundering Concept
